name: Eggnog Fruit Bread
author: T. Little
summary: I've made this yummy recipe every Christmas in my adult life.
ingredients: ½ cup chopped red and green candied cherries
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Lightly grease an 8x4 inch loaf pan
Beat the butter, sugar, and eggs together in a mixing bowl
Stir in the flour, baking powder, and sat, alternating with the eggnog, just until the dry ingredients are moistened
Fold in the pecans, raisins, and cherries until evenly blended
Spoon the batter into the prepared pan
Bake in preheated oven until top is golden and springs back when lightly touched, about 70 minutes
Cool in pan 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack to cool completely
